name: Heli Fighter Command
description:
Heli Fighter Command is 3D side scrolling shooter inspired by Retro game Cobra Command and Series of Strike titles.

You as Pilot Combat Heli, investigating some area in middle of Kalimantan Tropical Forest.

The forest has invested by some weird giant creature, investigate, repel the creature and save the scientist who trapped in the forest.

Features:

  1. Customizable Heli loadout.
  2. Giant Creatures with unique attack pattern.
  3. Gun and Blasting Giant Creature.
  4. Varied and challenging objective for each stage.

Upcoming Features:

  1. Random Play mode with higher difficulty enemies will give more reward.
  2. Collect Alien Tech to create Alien technology weapon.
  3. Add Alien High Value Target.
  4. A lot more Human Tech Weapon and Alien Tech Weapon, your Heli can be Alien Ship!
  5. More Stages with different environment like village, city and volcano.
  6. Add Story to the game.

Targeting Platform:

  1. Windows PC.
  2. Steam.
  3. Play Store.
